sess_12345.text: What are the best performance tips for large React applications?
Optimizing a large React app primarily involves minimizing unnecessary re-renders and improving initial load time. Here is a summary of key techniques:

rows: Higher-Order Component to memoize functional components.
Memoize functions to avoid re-creation on every render.
Rendering only visible list items in long lists.

sess_67890.text: How to structure a robust Node.js Express API?
A robust Express API often uses a 'Controller-Service-Route' pattern for separation of concerns. This makes the codebase modular and scalable.

rows: Defines endpoints and calls Controller functions.
Handles request/response and calls Service methods.
Contains business logic and data manipulation.
